moveBot package

Submodules

moveBot.simple_move module

class moveBot.simple_move.MoveBot[source]

Bases: Node

MoveBot node.

Turn a goal end effector position and orientation into a trajectory to be executed by the Franka Emika robot arm. The position and orientation of the end effector is given in relation to the frame located at the base of the robot.

async box_callback(request, response)[source]

Call back fucntion for call_box service.

Publish saved box information to Planning Scene. Get current Planning Scene from get_planning_scene. Add/Update box in the world.collision_objects. Publish updated Planning Scene.

Args:

request (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.request): Empty. response (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.response): Empty.

Return:

Empty

async clear_callback(request, response)[source]

Call back fucntion for clear_all_box service.

Clear all collision_objects in PlanningScene.world

Args:

request (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.request): Empty. response (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.response): Empty.

Return:

Empty

async execute_callback(request, response)[source]

Set the robot arm along the trajectory path generated by the plan callback.

The robot will move in RViz and the physical robot will follow this movement.

Args:

request (Empty): Empty message to execute the planned trajectory. response (Empty_Response): Returns an empty value.

Return:

Empty_Response: Returns an empty value.

get_ik_rqst_msg(pose_vec)[source]

Get IK request message.

Process a pose request message and turn it into a response usable by the inverse kinematics callback function.

Args:

pose_vec (ndarray): Contains the request message to be converted into a usable IK msg.

Return:

ikmsg (PositionIKRequest): Processed version of the pose_vec that can be used by IK.

get_motion_request(start, goal, execute)[source]

Process a motion request message into a response usable by the motion planning.

callback function.

Args:

start (RobotState): Start configuration of the robot. goal (RobotState): End goal configuration of the robot. execute (Boolean): Start execute immediately or manually.

Return:

plan_request (MoveGroup_Goal): Request to generate the trajectory in the callback.

async ik_callback(request, response)[source]

IK Callback Function.

Generate the inverse kinematics solution that gives the joint angles to reach a desired end effector configuration.

Args:

ikmsg (PositionIKRequest): Processed version of the pose_vec that can be used by IK. request (Float64[] position Float64[] orientation): Request pose of initial location. response (RobotState): Computes the IK solution for the given ikmsg.

Return:

RobotState: The computed joint angles from the inverse kinematics function.

js_cb(jointstate)[source]

Call back function of the goal pose subscriber. Stores the GoalPose message received.

Args:

jointstate (JointState): Contains the information of the current robot joint angles.

async plan_callback(request, response)[source]

Plan the cartesian trajectory path that the robot arm will follow.

This path will be followed by the robot upon execution.

Args:

request (GetPlanRqst): Message that includes the start position, goal position of the trajectory, and a flag that indicates if its in XYZ coords or joint positions, as well as a flag that determines if it should execute immediately or not. response (MotionPlanRequest): Message to send to the move_action client.

Return:

response (MotionPlanRequest): Message to send to the move_action client.

async remove_callback(request, response)[source]

Call back fucntion for clear_current_box service.

Clear the box in PlanningScene.world.collision_objects with the id which is match the save box information

Args:

request (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.request): Empty. response (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.response): Empty.

Return:

Empty

send_execute()[source]

Make the execute message to be used by the execute callback.

Return:

ExecuteTrajectory_Goal: Message to send to the callback function to execute the planned trajectory.

timer_callback()[source]

Set up the transform listener to get the end effector position information.

Call back fucntion for add_box service.

Update the box infomation (id, position, size)

Args:

request (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.request): Box information. response (movebot_interface/srv/AddBox.response): Empty.

String: id float: x float: y float: z float: l float: w float: h

Return:

moveBot.simple_move.quaternion_from_euler(ai, aj, ak)[source]

Take in Euler angles and converts them to quaternions. Function taken from link above.

Parameters

  • ai – (float) Roll angle.

  • aj – (float) Pitch angle.

  • ak – (float) Yaw angle.

Returns

Array of quaternion angles.
